name: Cadenza: The Kiss of Death - A Mystery Hidden Object Game (Full)
name_original: Cadenza: The Kiss of Death - A Mystery Hidden Object Game (Full)
description:
Unlock the complete adventure with a single purchase! No in-app purchases!

You are asked to help with a murder case where the killer is female and her choice of weapon, a kiss of death. Can you find the murderer before another victim falls for her charms?

• SAVE YOUR FIANCE FROM THE BLACK WIDOW
Upon revisiting the Jazz Pepper Club, you quickly take part in chasing the murderer who has targeted Anthony!

• DODGE OBSTACLES TO FIND YOUR LOVE
A number of strange events take place on your way to the club, and you find that you’re blocked at every turn! Can you evade these difficult circumstances in time?

• NO MAN IS SAFE FROM THE DEADLY BLACK KISS
Reveal major clues to capture the culprit through unique mini-games and innovative hidden object scenes.

• CONTINUE THE MYSTERY IN THE BONUS GAME
Become a detective in the additional game found in this Collector’s Edition. Plus, enjoy exclusive extras including a Strategy Guide and mini-games that can be replayed!
